item.title: Monitoring Container VMs with vRealize Operations Manager
item.author: Author
item.description: Based on talks with customers who already made their experiences running containerized applications in test as well as in production and who are using vSphere Integrated Containers for their way to go, I decided to build a dashboard to monitor those workloads (Container-VMs) with VMware´s Cloud Management Solution, vRealize Operations Manager (vR Ops). Figure I: VIC monitoring high level overview" Figure I: VIC monitoring high level overview The Dashboard Treating Containers as "First-Class Citizens" is what vSphere Integrated Containers can offer to IT-(Dev)Ops Teams through instantiating a Container-Image as a Virtual Machine.
